StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetSchoolsByRS]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@OrgID int AS
SELECT SCHOOL_CODE, RTRIM(HIGHSCHOOL_NAME) + ', ' + IsNULL(CITY, "") + ', ' + IsNULL(STATE_CODE, "") SCHOOL_NAME FROM HIGH_SCHOOL, ORGANIZATION_MAP WHERE ORGANIZATION_MAP.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND ORGANIZATION_MAP.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = HIGH_SCHOOL.ORGANIZATION_ID ORDER BY HIGHSCHOOL_NAME
